00007 sub givenVariableScaleAndRoots {
00008     my ($class, $variable,$scale,@roots) = @_;
00009 #   print @roots,"\n";
00010     my @coefficients;
00011     my $degree = scalar(@roots);
00012     foreach my $i (0..$degree-1) {$roots[$i] *= -1;}
00013     foreach my $i (0..$degree) {
00014         $coefficients[$i] = $scale * symmetric_function($degree-$i, \@roots);
00015     }
00016 #   print @coefficients, "\n";
00017     my $self = {'degree' => $degree,
00018                 'variable' => $variable,
00019                 'scale' => $scale,
00020                 'roots' => \@roots,
00021                 'coefficients' => \@coefficients,
00022                 };
00023     bless $self, $class;
00024 #   print "OK\n";
00025     return($self);
00026 }

00028 sub givenVariableScaleVTranslateAndRoots {
00029     my ($class, $variable,$scale,$vtranslate,@roots) = @_;
00030 #   print @roots,"\n";
00031     my @coefficients;
00032     my $degree = scalar(@roots);
00033     foreach my $i (0..$degree) {
00034         $coefficients[$i] = $scale * symmetric_function($degree-$i, \@roots);
00035     }
00036     $coefficients[0] += $vtranslate;
00037 #   print @coefficients, "\n";
00038     my $self = {'degree' => $degree,
00039                 'variable' => $variable,
00040                 'scale' => $scale,
00041                 'roots' => \@roots,
00042                 'coefficients' => \@coefficients,
00043                 };
00044     bless $self, $class;
00045 #   print "OK\n";
00046     return($self);
00047 }   
00048     
00049 sub givenVariableAndCoefficients { # Give Coefficients from a_0 to a_n 
00050     my ($class, $variable, @coefficients) = @_;
00051     my $degree = scalar(@coefficients) -1;
00052     while ($degree >= 0 and $coefficients[$degree] == 0)    {
00053         $degree--;
00054     }
00055     my $self = {'degree' => $degree,
00056                 'variable' => $variable,
00057                 'scale' => 1,
00058                 'roots' => [],
00059                 'coefficients' => \@coefficients,
00060                 };
00061     bless $self, $class;
00062     return($self);
00063 }

00085 sub TeXizeHighFirst {
00086     my $self = shift;
00087     my $degree = $self->degree();
00088     my $variable = $self->variable();
00089     my $coefficients = $self->coefficients();
00090     my $found = 0;
00091     my $string = "";
00092     my $coef;
00093     my $jth;
00094     foreach my $i (0..$degree-1) {
00095         $jth = $degree - $i;
00096         $vterm = ($jth == 1) ? "$variable" : "$variable^{${jth}}";
00097         if (($coef = $coefficients -> [$jth]) != 0) 
00098             {if ($found) {
00099                 $string .= 
00100                     ($coef == 1) ? " + $vterm"
00101                     :   ($coef > 0) ? " + $coef $vterm"
00102                         : ($coef == -1) ? " - $vterm"
00103                             : "  $coef $vterm";
00104                 }
00105             else {
00106                 $found=1;
00107                 $string .= 
00108                     ($coef == 1) ? " $vterm"
00109                     :   ($coef > 0) ? " $coef $vterm"
00110                         : ($coef == -1) ? " - $vterm"
00111                             : "  $coef $vterm";
00112                 }
00113         }
00114     }           
00115     $jth = 0;
00116     if (($coef = $coefficients -> [$jth]) != 0) 
00117             {if ($found) {
00118                 $string .= ($coef > 0) ? " + $coef "
00119                     : "  $coef " ;
00120                 }
00121             else {
00122                 $found=1;
00123                 $string .= ($coef > 0) ? " $coef "
00124                     : "  $coef " ;
00125                 }
00126     }
00127     return($string);
00128 }

00130 sub TeXizeLowFirst {
00131     my $self = shift;
00132     my $degree = $self->degree();
00133     my $variable = $self->variable();
00134     my $coefficients = $self->coefficients();
00135     my $found = 0;
00136     my $string = "";
00137     my $coef;
00138     my $jth;
00139     $jth = 0;
00140     if (($coef = $coefficients -> [$jth]) != 0) {
00141             $found=1;
00142             $string .= $coef;
00143     }
00144     foreach my $i (1..$degree) {
00145         $jth = $i;
00146         $vterm = ($jth == 1) ? "$variable" : "$variable^{${jth}}";
00147         if (($coef = $coefficients -> [$jth]) != 0) 
00148             {if ($found) {
00149                 $string .= 
00150                     ($coef == 1) ? " + $vterm"
00151                     :   ($coef > 0) ? " + $coef $vterm"
00152                         : ($coef == -1) ? " - $vterm"

00156                 $found=1;

00158                     ($coef == 1) ? " $vterm"
00159                     :   ($coef > 0) ? " $coef $vterm"
00160                         : ($coef == -1) ? " - $vterm"
00161                             : "  $coef $vterm";
00162                 }
00163         }
00164     }           
00165     return($string);

00169 sub perlizeHighFirst {
00170     my $self = shift;
00171     my $degree = $self->degree();
00172     my $variable = $self->variable();
00173     my $coefficients = $self->coefficients();
00174     my $found = 0;
00175     my $string = "";
00176     my $coef;
00177     my $jth;
00178     foreach my $i (0..$degree-1) {
00179         $jth = $degree - $i;
00180         $vterm = ($jth == 1) ? "$variable" : "$variable**(${jth})";
00181         if (($coef = $coefficients -> [$jth]) != 0) 
00182             {if ($found) {
00183                 $string .= 
00184                     ($coef == 1) ? " + $vterm"
00185                     :   ($coef > 0) ? " + $coef * $vterm"
00186                         : ($coef == -1) ? " - $vterm"
00187                             : "  $coef * $vterm";
00188                 }
00189             else {
00190                 $found=1;
00191                 $string .= 
00192                     ($coef == 1) ? " $vterm"
00193                     :   ($coef > 0) ? " $coef* $vterm"
00194                         : ($coef == -1) ? " - $vterm"
00195                             : "  $coef * $vterm";
00196                 }
00197         }
00198     }           
00199     $jth = 0;
00200     if (($coef = $coefficients -> [$jth]) != 0) 
00201             {if ($found) {
00202                 $string .= ($coef > 0) ? " + $coef "
00203                     : "  $coef " ;
00204                 }
00205             else {
00206                 $found=1;
00207                 $string .= ($coef > 0) ? " $coef "
00208                     : "  $coef " ;
00209                 }
00210     }
00211     return($string);

00214 sub ith_symmetric_function {
00215     my ($K, $i, $arrayref) = @_;
00216     my $N = scalar(@$arrayref);
00217     if ($K < 0 or $i < 0 or $K > $N or $i > $N - $K ) 
00218         {return(0);}
00219     elsif ($K == 0) 
00220         {return(1);}
00221     elsif ($K == 1)
00222         {return($arrayref -> [$i]);}
00223     else {
00224         my $sum = 0;
00225         foreach my $j ($i+1 .. $N-($K-1)) {
00226             $sum += ith_symmetric_function($K-1, $j, $arrayref);
00227         }
00228         return(($arrayref -> [$i]) * $sum); 
00229     }
00230 }
00231 
00232 sub symmetric_function {
00233     my ($K, $arrayref) = @_;
00234     my $N = scalar(@$arrayref);
00235     if ($K < 0 or $K > $N) {return(0);}
00236     if ($K == 0) {return(1);}
00237     my $sum=0;
00238     foreach my $i (0..$N-$K) {
00239         $sum += ith_symmetric_function($K, $i, $arrayref);
00240     }
00241     return($sum);
00242 }

00244 sub changeVar {
00245     my $self = shift;
00246     my $newVar = shift;
00247     if (!defined($newVar)) {return(undef());}
00248     my $coefficients=$self->coefficients;
00249     my $newP = givenVariableAndCoefficients Polynomial($newVar, @{$coefficients});
00250     return($newP);
00251 }

00253 sub scalarMult {
00254     my $self = shift;
00255     my $scalar = shift;
00256     if (!(defined($scalar))) {return(undef());}
00257     my $variable = $self -> variable;
00258     my $coefficients = $self -> coefficients;
00259     my $degree = $self -> degree;
00260     my @scalarMultCoeffs = ();
00261     foreach my $i (0..$degree) {
00262         $scalarMultCoeffs[$i] = $scalar * $coefficients->[$i];
00263     }
00264     my $scalarM = givenVariableAndCoefficients Polynomial($variable, @scalarMultCoeffs);
00265     return($scalarM);
00266 }

00268 sub polyAddLike {
00269     my $self = shift;
00270     my $other = shift;
00271     if (!(ref($other) eq "Polynomial")) { return(undef());}
00272     if (($self -> variable) ne ($other -> variable)) {return(undef());}
00273     my $variable = $self->variable;
00274     my $mycoefficients = $self->coefficients;
00275     my $othercoefficients = $other -> coefficients;
00276     my $myDegree = $self -> degree;
00277     my $otherDegree = $other -> degree;
00278     my $degree = ($myDegree >= $otherDegree) ? $myDegree : $otherDegree;
00279     my @coefficients;
00280     foreach my $i (0..$degree) {
00281         $coefficients[$i] = ( (defined($mycoefficients->[$i])) ? $mycoefficients->[$i] : 0 )
00282                           + ( (defined($othercoefficients->[$i])) ? $othercoefficients->[$i] : 0 );
00283     }
00284     my $sum = givenVariableAndCoefficients Polynomial($variable, @coefficients);
00285     return($sum);
00286 }

00289 sub polyMultLike {
00290     my $self = shift;
00291     my $other = shift;
00292     if (!(ref($other) eq "Polynomial")) { return(undef());}
00293     if (($self -> variable) ne ($other -> variable)) {return(undef());}
00294     my $variable = $self->variable;
00295     my $mycoefficients = $self->coefficients;
00296     my $othercoefficients = $other -> coefficients;
00297     my $myDegree = $self -> degree;
00298     my $otherDegree = $other -> degree;
00299     my $degree = $myDegree+$otherDegree;
00300     my @coefficients;
00301     foreach my $i (0..$degree) {
00302         $coefficients[$i]=0;
00303         my $iB = ($i > $otherDegree ) ? $i-$otherDegree : 0;
00304         my $iT = ($i > $myDegree ) ? $myDegree : $i;
00305         foreach my $j ($iB .. $iT) {
00306             $coefficients[$i] += $mycoefficients->[$j] * $othercoefficients->[$i-$j];
00307         }
00308     }
00309     my $polyM = givenVariableAndCoefficients Polynomial($variable, @coefficients);
00310     return($polyM);
00311 }

00314 sub derivative {
00315     my $self = shift;
00316     my $variable = shift;
00317     if (!(defined($variable))) { $variable = $self -> variable;}
00318     my $degree = $self -> degree;
00319     my $coefficients = $self->coefficients;
00320     my @derivativeCoeffs = ();
00321     foreach my $i (1..$degree) {
00322         $derivativeCoeffs[$i-1] = $i * $coefficients->[$i];
00323     }
00324     my $deriv = givenVariableAndCoefficients Polynomial($variable, @derivativeCoeffs);
00325     return($deriv);
00326 }

00329 sub antiDerivative {
00330     my $self = shift;
00331     my $variable = shift;
00332     if (!(defined($variable))) { $variable = $self -> variable;}
00333     my $degree = $self -> degree;
00334     my $coefficients = $self->coefficients;
00335     my @antiDerivativeCoeffs = ();
00336     $antiDerivativeCoeffs[0] = 0;
00337     foreach my $i (0..$degree) {
00338         $antiDerivativeCoeffs[$i+1] =  ($coefficients->[$i])/($i+1);
00339     }
00340     my $antiDeriv = givenVariableAndCoefficients Polynomial($variable, @antiDerivativeCoeffs);
00341     return($antiDeriv);
00342 }
